questions.description: 1. Are you aware that waste segregation is mandated by high court?
2. Are you aware that BBMP can fine citizens if waste is not segregated at source?
5. Do you use 2 bin and 1 bag to segregate waste?
6. Is there proper door-to-door waste collection in your area?
7. Do you compost wet waste in your house?
8. Do you know where the dry waste collection center is?
9. Who do you think is responsible for majority of citizens to follow the practice of waste segregation?
10.Has any of your family member suffered from any infection/disease in the past 6 months?
11. Do you know what are the sources of the infection/disease?
12. Any suggestions/feedback regarding waste management in your locality?
